title: N P A
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: n_p_a
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $125.3K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with N P A. The average
  contract duration was 0.41 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.4M. The longest
  contract was 1.45 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $8.3M.
lookup_name: 'N P A'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '125.3K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '6'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '17%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '16%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.2M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.41'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.4M'
s425_max_duration: '1.45'
s422_max_contract_value: '8.3M'
---
